bakepipe 0.1

Parse R scripts to extract file dependencies

Source: R/parse.R
parse.Rd

Finds all R scripts in the project and parses them to detect file_in() and file_out() calls. Only string literals are supported as arguments to these functions.

Usage

parse()

Value

List with three elements:

  • scripts: Named list where each element represents a script with 'inputs' and 'outputs'

  • inputs: Character vector of all files used as inputs across all scripts

  • outputs: Character vector of all files produced as outputs across all scripts

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Parse all scripts in the project
dependencies <- parse()
} # }
